text: Barbara Hepworth (10 January 1903 â€“ 20 May 1975) was an English sculptor. She is considered a leading name in modern sculpture. Hepworth was a member of the the colony of artists who lived in St Ives during the World War II. Her second husband was the painter Ben Nicholson.Barbara Hepworth website ==References== Category:1903 births Category:1975 deaths Category:British sculptors
